sections.heading: intent.The Legislature encourages counties to work together under the provisions of the County Purchasing Act when joint purchases would be to the best advantage of such counties

sections.text:
23-3103.Legislative intent.

The Legislature encourages counties to work together under the provisions of the County Purchasing Act when joint purchases would be to the best advantage of such counties.

SourceLaws 1985, LB 393, ยง 3.
